message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product today for $20,000.  I think it's a great deal for something of this quality. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $18,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is already a competitive price for this product. I could meet you halfway at $19,000. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I am still not able to go above $18,000 for the product. I believe we can come to an agreement at this price. Thank you for considering my offer.
